page.title: 08The Church
page.content: { {Arts and Crafts. }The font is perhaps the church's greatest treasure.It is thought to have been given by Richard 1 to the Abbot Robert for his safe return from captivety.Amongst the fine stained glass windows is one by Kempe and the bird windows are 15th century and unique. {Population}This Parish church owes its size to the fact that the area it _originally served was much larger than now and it was built at the hub of the district.However,since the Reformation,the main population has centred around Robertsbridge. {Tourism}Tourists visit the church throughout the year.The money they donate is needed to help pay for the general upkeep.The economical problem is always of concern.
